exam.question: Most nurses are women, but in the higher ranks of the medical profession women are in a ________.

answer.explain: in a minority： 占少数。 句意： 大部分护士为女性， 但在高层医学专家队伍中， 女性只占少数。 scarcity： 缺乏， 不足； minimum： 最低限度； shortage： 缺少， 缺乏。

sentences.sContent: Gaelic is still spoken in Ireland by a tiny minority.
sentences.sCn: 爱尔兰仍有极少数人在说盖尔语。

sentences.sContent: ...high- minority schools are unfairly treated across our country...
...both overseas and in some minority groups in North America...
...Some day you may be either a speaker or a listener in a situation involving people from other countries or members of a minority group in North America...

synos.tran: 少数民族；少数派；未成年

phrases.pCn: 少数民族语言；少数人的语言；小语种

words.tran: 未成年的；次要的；较小的；小调的；二流的
未成年人；小调；副修科目

trans.tranOther: a small group of people or things within a much larger group
